jobDescription: Here is the Job DescriptionPosition: Data Analyst  Location: Menlo Park, CA 94025  Duration: 3 months (assignment)Duties:Build data based reports for Client's advertisersWork in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and a scaled solutions set up to deliver standardized reporting solutionsCreate custom reporting solutions using data discovery tools and automated systemsAbility to analyze data, and draw actionable insights to provide recommendationsAbility to strike a balance between working in a process oriented environment, and taking independent calls to solve for problemsAssume full responsibility of deliverables and perform thoroughQuality check on all deliverables prior to shipping be a strong team player with good analytical and problem-solving skillsSkills: BE/BTECH/MCA degree (preferred) with a strong academic record2+ years’ experience with data and analytics is a mustProficient in advanced Excel and intermediateSQL Detail oriented execution styleExceptional at multi-tasking and problem solvingFast learner & Self- StarterExcellent written and verbal communicationEducation: BE/BTECH/MCA degree (preferred) with a strong academic record preferred, but experience with Client tools is more important.
